ingredients: 2  frozen bananas, peeled and chopped, 6  fresh figs, halved,   +   3/4 cup milk,   +   3/4 cup orange juice
nutrition: Total Fat 3g 4%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Cholesterol 7mg 2%, Sodium 42mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 78g 28%, Dietary Fiber 9g 31%, Total Sugars 58g, Protein 6g, Vitamin C 61mg 304%, Calcium 190mg 15%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 1191mg 25%
